description: This file defines the interface IOttServices for the WPEFramework's Exchange namespace, detailing behaviors for pinging, retrieving, invalidating, and updating permissions related to OTT services.

classes.name: IOttServices
classes.description: An interface representing OTT Services with methods to communicate and manage permissions.

methods.name: Ping
methods.description: Send a message to the service and receive a reply string.

methods.name: GetPermissions
methods.description: Retrieve permissions for a specific application ID as a JSON array.

methods.name: InvalidatePermissions
methods.description: Invalidate cached permissions for a given application ID.

methods.name: UpdatePermissionsCache
methods.description: Update permissions cache for the specified application ID, returning the count of updated permissions.
